data.title: Golf Club Fitting in San Carlos, CA
meta_keywords: Golf Club Fitting in San Carlos
data.meta_description: Visit the Club Champion store in San Carlos at 1123 Industrial Road. Make an appointment, get contact information, in-store services, and opening hours.
data.text:
P.A.R. PROGRAM (PERKS AND REWARDS PROGRAM)

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

Club Champion may, at any time, terminate, alter or modify the P.A.R. program and/or these Terms and Conditions without any further obligations and/or benefits to members without notice even though such changes may affect the value of benefits or rewards for redemption. Club Champion reserves the right to apply changes retroactively to benefits already accrued under the program. These terms and conditions are void where prohibited by law.

BENEFIT TERMS:

1 free fitting, excluding full bag. Use your P.A.R. Membership # to book your free fitting, excluding full bag fittings, online or by calling Club Champion. This fitting must be booked and completed within your membership period. This benefit does not roll over in the event of a requalification. Fitting must be completed in one appointment. Not applicable to previous fittings or bookings. Appointments are limited.

3 free 1-hour TrackMan practice sessions. 1-hour TrackMan practice sessions must be booked through your fitter or through Club Champion’s Customer Experience team; please relay your P.A.R. Membership #. TrackMan sessions may be subject to blackout times. TrackMan sessions cannot be booked more than 14 days out. TrackMan sessions cannot be canceled or rescheduled; a request for cancelation or rescheduling will result in a forfeiture of the asset. Sessions must be booked in one-hour (60-minute) increments and cannot be split. This benefit does not roll over in the event of a requalification. Sessions are subject to bay and fitter availability. Appointments are limited.

$5 discount per golf ball dozen. Receive a $5 discount on golf ball brands carried in-store. Not applicable to golf balls that are already discounted. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Purchase must be made in-store. Subject to ball inventory. Not applicable on previous purchases.

Free new grip installation. Receive a waived installation fee ($6 savings per grip) per new grip. Only applicable on grips purchased through Club Champion. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Purchase must be made in-store. Grip selection subject to inventory. Not applicable on previous purchases.

50% off SST PUREing and retro-PUREing. Receive 50% off shaft SST PUREing or retro-PUREing. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Purchase must be made in-store. PUREing or retro-PUREing may require that clubs be sent to a Club Champion warehouse; the process, including shipping, may take up to 10 business days and is subject to third-party shipping timelines. Not applicable on previous purchases.

Club customization. Receive customization (stamping, paint fill, custom ferrules) up to a $50 value. The $50 value must be used on a single transaction; if the entire value is not used, the remainder will be forfeited. Please relay your P.A.R. Membership # at time of purchase. Customization must be done by Club Champion builders; refinishing and other third-party customizations are excluded. Customization may require that clubs be sent to a Club Champion warehouse; the process, including shipping, is subject to builder availability and third-party shipping timelines. This benefit does not roll over in the event of a requalification. Subject to availability. Not applicable on previous purchases.

Exclusive offers and giveaways. Subject to the offer or giveaway terms.

MEMBERSHIP/ELIGIBILITY

Club Champion P.A.R. program is open to all persons who are at least 13 years of age, residents of the United States (including United States territories) or Canada; and have provided a valid email address at the time of their fitting and qualifying purchase. Club Champion customers are automatically enrolled in the program by completing a qualifying purchase of $1,500 or more. By participating in the P.A.R. program, you represent that you agree to these terms and conditions. Customers may opt out of the program by notifying Club Champion (see details below). Your membership is non-transferable and is subject to these terms and conditions, as they may be amended from time to time. Enrollment begins upon the completion of your first qualifying purchase. After your qualifying purchase, you will receive an email with your membership account number. You are solely responsible for protecting your membership number and not sharing your membership number with anyone else.

HOW TO QUALIFY

Every Club Champion customer who purchases $1,500 or more within the calendar year qualifies for the program. Re-qualification takes place with every $1,500 in qualifying purchases. Upon requalification, TrackMan and fitting benefits reset (do not stack. Calculations are based upon pre-tax dollars spent at checkout. Dollars cannot be earned on purchases made prior to October 1, 2023. Non-qualifying purchases include returned merchandise, refunds, and gift cards. Only one membership account number may be used in connection with a purchase. Dollars will only post to one Club Champion P.A.R. program account per person.

GENERAL TERMS

Membership account number has no cash value and is non-transferable. Club Champion is not responsible for communication errors, including distribution of and notification of dollars spent due to a change of email address or email deliverability. Unused benefits do not roll over in the event of requalification. Other restrictions or exclusions may apply.

MEMBERSHIP CANCELLATION, MODIFICATION, EXPIRATION AND TERMINATION

You may cancel your membership at any time by contacting Club Champion’s Customer Service by mail, email or telephone. Club Champion will in its sole discretion, terminate your account on or after the last day of the of your membership period if you have not completed additional qualifying purchases to extend. In all matters relating to the administration of the Club Champion P.A.R. program, the decisions of Club Champion shall be final. Club Champion reserves the right to cancel, amend or revoke any program, including, without limitation, the P.A.R. program, at any time due to reasonable business consideration or circumstances beyond its control or as required by applicable law. In addition, Club Champion reserves the right to terminate your P.A.R. membership and void any balance accumulated in such account(s), if you, in Club Champion’s sole discretion, violate any of these terms and conditions or any applicable law, via deception, forgery, fraud, or commit any other abuse of the P.A.R. program.

HOW TO CONTACT THE CLUB CHAMPION P.A.R. PROGRAM

Official terms for this program can be found at: ClubChampion.com/rewards. For information about your account or to update your account information, or to schedule reward services contact Club Champion’s Customer Service. Please have your membership number with you when contacting Customer Service. Customer service hours are 8 am - 6 pm Central Standard Time, Monday – Friday.

You can contact us by mail at: Club Champion, 7501 S. Quincy Street, suite 130, Willowbrook, IL 60527 or by email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.. By phone: (888) 340-7820.

"I did a full bag fitting with Adam over the winter, and WOW was I blown away! I'll share a bit of my experience here:

I originally went to Club Champion because they have access to more exotic shaft options on hand, in particular for my driver. After doing my research, I narrowed down what I wanted to two different shafts. At my fitting, I was able to swing both of those, and they just weren't getting the results I wanted. Adam had me try a couple other options that I hadn't considered, and I was astounded by the results. Within 20 minutes, Adam had me dialed in to a new shaft that increased my ball speed, reduced spin, and increased the total distance of my driver by 23 yards. INCREDIBLE!

After getting fit for the driver, we went through the rest of the bag; hybrid, irons, wedges, and putter. Adam had a no-pressure sales style, even at one time saying that I'd be a fool to replace the wedges I'm currently hitting, since the data showed he couldn't fit me into anything better. He didn't have any bias towards certain brands. He just wanted whatever works best for my swing. I appreciate that he's all about data and results, and not just trying to sell me as much as possible.

Fast forward to this summer: I've had by far the best season of golf of my life, mostly because of my increased accuracy and length off the tee with my new driver and hybrid. Par 5s have started to surrender eagles and birdies more frequently, and I have much shorter approaches coming into the greens than I ever have. I was already a golf junkie beforehand, but my enjoyment for the game has been elevated to a whole new level this year.

If you're serious about improving your game, don't spare the expense. There is so much more that goes into selecting a club than just picking a regular/stiff flex shaft. Unlike some of the other places you can go, these guys know what they're doing and are going to get you exactly what you need." — Jonny J. | Edina, MN

"Really pleased with my Club Champion fitting. Wasn't quite sure what to expect, my prior fittings (if you want to call it that) in a golf shop bay were based on a handful of demo clubs they had available to test. Stock items only, no selection or ability to try different shafts, etc.

Now Club Champion is a whole different story. Racks and racks of shafts and clubheads...which actually was a bit daunting at first. Then met with Rich, a Master Fitter & Club Builder. He put me through the paces with my own clubs to establish a baseline and actually "watch" my swing. Then the tweaking began with different clubheads from different manufacturers and shaft combinations, with him picking up the nuances of my swing and finding the best combos. He could tell when I had a great shot as soon the ball left the clubhead, while we waited for the TrackMan to catch up and confirm just how great it was. I was impressed. I'm 69 years old, my mobility is not what it used to be, and I've been losing distance at a frustrating rate. BUT, I have to tell you after we were done, I was hitting the irons 20-30 yards further (with a slight draw, no less) than when I walked in the door. Amazing! Then on to the driver. We tried a few combos and came to the conclusion that I was hitting my existing driver pretty good as is. That in itself sold me on Rich as a club fitter and Club Champion as a company. Rich took the time, answered all my questions and had answers that I didn't even know the questions to ask. No pressure." — BG | Del Mar, CA
